p.q: Miranda's students have just finished reading a text about different ways to deal with stress. Now Miranda wants to check if her students have acquired a global understanding of it.
p.q2: Which of the following instructions can be delivered for that purpose?

as.a: "Look for the expression 'pamper yourself' and tell me what you think it means. You can't use a dictionary."
"Close your books and discuss the following questions in pairs: 'What is the text about?' 'Why do you think so?'"
"The text mentions six relaxation techniques. 'Which are those techniques?' Take a look at the article again and underline the techniques."
